customCss: .hoverinfo p {margin-bottom: 4px} .hoverinfo p:nth-child(3) {border-top: none; margin-top: 0; padding-top: 0;} .hoverinfo p:last-child {margin-bottom: 10px;} .filter-input:nth-child(3) select {width: 220px !important;} .filter-input:nth-child(3) .select-wrapper {width: 230px !important;}
